greyuser: Don't you dare tell me what to do! https://imageshack.com/a/img673/1714/nZN7Vc.gif
bouncer: How do you expect me to move? I'm only able to bounce!:grin:
online: /me the %%BOTNAME%% from Club RevolutionZ. Bar is open for any !order https://imageshack.com/a/img540/1087/am8wbn.gif
songknown: /me :repeat: This song has been played %%PLAYS%% time(s) in the last %%TIMETOTAL%%, last play was %%LASTTIME%% ago. :repeat:
timelimit: /me @%%NAME%%, your song is longer than %%MAXLENGTH%% minutes, you need permission to play longer songs.
permissionownsong: /me :up: @%%NAME%% has permission to play their own production!
isopen: /me The roulette is now open! Type !join to participate!
winnerpicked: /me A winner has been picked! @%%NAME%% to position %%POSITION%%.
alreadyadding: /me User is already being added! Changed the desired position to %%POSITION%%.
adding: /me Added @%%NAME%% to the queue. Current queue: %%POSITION%%.
notdisconnected: /me @%%NAME%% did not disconnect during my time here.
noposition: /me No last position known. The waitlist needs to update at least once to register a user's last position.
toolongago: /me @%%NAME%%'s last disconnect (DC or leave) was too long ago: %%TIME%%.
valid: /me @%%NAME%% disconnected %%TIME%% ago and should be at position %%POSITION%%.
warning1: Hey @%%NAME%%! Are you awake? Get back to me within 2 minutes or you'll be booted from the waitlist! https://imageshack.com/a/img674/4159/1JPEXg.gif
warning2: @%%NAME%%, you better be sober or I'm booting you out! Last chance son! https://imageshack.com/a/img661/1077/Wd1Bg8.gif
afkremove: That's it @%%NAME%% ! You're outta here! Go home boy! You're drunk! https://imageshack.com/a/img537/9860/x2eB3S.gif
spam: /me @%%NAME%%, here's an idea to stop spamming...GET YOUR CAT OFF THE KEYBOARD!:pouting_cat::muscle::computer:
roomadvertising: /me Hey @%%NAME%%! None  of this digital addressing in my Club!:no_entry_sign:
adfly: /me @%%NAME%%, please change your autowoot program. We suggest PlugCubed: http://plugcubed.net/
activeusersintime: @%%NAME%% There have been %%AMOUNT%% users chatting in the past %%TIME%% minutes.
maximumafktimeset: /me [@%%NAME%%] Maximum afk duration set to %%TIME%% minutes.
autowoot: We recommend PlugCubed (ALPHA) for autowooting @ http://plugcubed.net/ OR a pair of Beer Goggles @ http://tinyurl.com/CRevZBeerGoggles https://imageshack.com/a/img633/6365/CLoTV4.gif
brandambassador: /me A Brand Ambassador is the voice of the plug.dj users. They promote events, engage the community and share the plug.dj message around the world. For more info: http://blog.plug.dj/brand-ambassadors/
bouncerplusrank: /me @%%NAME%%, you ain't my manager to tell me to operate Bouncer+!:japanese_ogre:
eatdrink: /me You have just bought a Drink for the BarTender. *quietly sips a shot of Vodka* :trollface:
nouserdrink: /me doesn't see %%NAME%% in room and drinks it himself.:trollface:
selfdrink: ' @%%NAME%%, why don't you buy a drink for others and mingle while you're single!' https://imageshack.com/a/img537/7803/K112VM.gif
cycleguardtime: /me [@%%NAME%%] The cycleguard is set to %%TIME%% minute(s).
dclookuprank: /me [@%%NAME%%] Only bouncers and above can do a lookup for others.
notinwaitlist: /me @%%NAME%%, you are not on the waitlist.
eta: /me @%%NAME%% you will reach the booth in approximately %%TIME%%. Grab a drink in meantime.
starterhelp: /me This image will get you started on plug: %%LINK%%
roulettejoin: /me @%%NAME%% joined the roulette! (!leave if you regret it.)
jointime: /me [@%%NAMEFROM%%] @%%USERNAME%% has been in the room for %%TIME%%.
kickrank: /me [@%%NAME%%] you can't kick users with an equal or higher rank than you!
kick: @%%NAME%%, @%%USERNAME%% you are being kicked from Club RevolutionZ for %%TIME%% minutes. https://imageshack.com/a/img743/4707/hQ5Baf.gif
kill: :gun:I'm hit! I can see the light! Mama? Is that you? https://imageshack.com/a/img746/2344/NsyrEq.gif
songlink: /me Psst @%%NAME%%! Here's the link to current song: :notes: %%LINK%%
lockskippos: /me [@%%NAME%%] Lockskip will now move the dj to position %%POSITION%%.
lockguardtime: /me [@%%NAME%%] The lockguard is set to %%TIME%% minute(s).
maxlengthtime: /me [@%%NAME%%] The maximum song duration is set to %%TIME%% minutes.
addbotwaitlist: /me @%%NAME%%, if I get on the DJ console, who's gonna manage the Bar? Come on man! Let me do my darn job!:frowning:
mutedmaxtime: Sorry @%%NAME%% , but the superglue can only last for %%TIME%% minutes.:speak_no_evil:
unmuted: @%%NAME%% has used a solvent to remove the superglue off @%%USERNAME%% 's mouth. https://imageshack.com/a/img631/4156/tlTSi0.gif
muterank: @%%NAME%% You can't mute persons with an equal or higher rank than you.
reload: /me I need to take a leak.Be right back. https://imageshack.com/a/img673/3146/F9iAPH.gif
removenotinwl: /me [@%%NAME%%] Specified user @%%USERNAME%% is not in the waitlist.
roomrules: /me Please find the room rules here: %%LINK%% https://imageshack.com/a/img908/3288/Ez7NYE.gif
sessionstats: @%%NAME%% Total woots: %%WOOTS%%, total mehs: %%MEHS%%, total grabs: %%GRABS%%. https://imageshack.com/a/img907/8370/vlW9pi.gif
madeby: I was genectically modified and cloned by %%NAME%%
swapinvalid: /me [@%%NAME%%] Invalid user specified. (No names with spaces!)
swapwlonly: /me [@%%NAME%%] Please only swap users that are in the waitlist!
genres: /me Please find the permissible room genres here: %%LINK%%
unmuteeveryonerank: /me [@%%NAME%%] Only managers and up can unmute everyone at once.
unmuterank: /me [@%%NAME%%] You can't unmute persons with an equal or higher rank than you.
commandscd: /me [@%%NAME%%] The cooldown for commands by users is now set to %%TIME%% seconds.

selfcookie: ' @%%NAME%% 'Did you just sneak a :cookie: into your mouth? https://imageshack.com/a/img674/1113/D6i21S.gif'
eatalcohol: /me You have just bought an Alcoholic beverage for the BarTender. *secretly sips a glass of :beer: Bourbon.* :trollface:
nouseralcohol: /me *doesn't see %%NAME%% in room and stores the alcoholic beverage back in the fridge.* https://imageshack.com/a/img661/9785/R5Z6VP.gif
selfalcohol: @%%NAME%% ' Here's a chilled glass of Tiger Beer for you sir.' https://imageshack.com/a/img904/5619/neJC6Y.gif

nouserdonut: /me doesn't see %%NAME%% in room and eats the donut by himself.:trollface: https://imageshack.com/a/img911/7922/6u6tIr.gif

nouserpizza: /me doesn't see %%NAME%% in room and stores pizza in the oven again. https://imageshack.com/a/img540/7510/OWBbs1.gif
selfpizza: @%%NAME%% 'Why don't you buy a pizza for everyone?' https://imageshack.com/a/img661/1720/8vC8By.gif
eatchips: /me You have just bought a bag of Chips for the BarTender. 'Almost everytime I get a bag of chips filled with 80% air!!!
nouserchips: /me doesn't see %%NAME%% in room and eats the bag of chips alone. https://imageshack.com/a/img538/9923/76vZ09.gif
selfchips: @%%NAME%% 'Take your bag of chips and go...' https://imageshack.com/a/img911/3816/F4JH7I.gif
eatcupcake: /me You have just bought a Cupcake for the BarTender. 'OH! Cupcakes with sprinkle and cheery on it! Just the way I love them! https://imageshack.com/a/img538/5996/tRKr7l.gif
nousercupcake: /me *doesn't see %%NAME%% in room and puts the cupcake back*
selfcupcake: @%%NAME%% 'Rather than eating it yourself, you should buy a cupcake for someone and get a conversation rolling.' https://imageshack.com/a/img912/8760/VS3Hwv.gif
eatburger: /me You have just bought a burger for the BarTender. 'No thank you. I'm a little full.' https://imageshack.com/a/img913/3041/uEhkQY.gif
nouserburger: /me 'I can't take that order, %%NAME%% isn't in room.'
eaticecream: /me You have just bought an Icecream for the BarTender. 'I remember those times, when my Mama bought me an ice cream...haiz..
nousericecream: /me doesn't see %%NAME%% in room and licks the ice cream finished
selficecream: @%%NAME%% 'Careful, you might get a brainfreeze for selfishness.'
eatchocolate: /me You have just bought a bar of Chocolate for the BarTender. 'I LOVE CHOCOLATES!'
nouserchocolate: /me doesn't see %%NAME%% in room and places chocolate in his pockets.
selfchocolate: ' @%%NAME%% , you should gift these chocolates to another person. Maybe you'll get to know each other better'
eatrice: /me You have just bought a bowl of Rice for the BarTender. 'I wonder... is that the regular rice or the fried rice?'
nouserrice: /me doesn't see %%NAME%% in room and keeps the ricebox away for someone else.
selfrice: ' @%%NAME%% , why not buy a ricebox for someone?'
eatfries: /me You have just bought a bag of Fries for the BarTender. 'I personally find these very salty'.
nouserfries: /me doesn't see %%NAME%% in room and finishes the box of fries
selffries: ' @%%NAME%% , the fries are salty, do you want a drink with that?'
eatbun: /me You have just bought a Bun for the BarTender. *Eats the bun like a child*
nouserbun: /me doesn't see %%NAME%% in room and stuffs the bun into his mouth.
nouserpunish: /me '%%NAME%% isn't in the room. Stop raging.' https://imageshack.com/a/img674/1271/QAL0tU.gif
